# tokenStyle

**Instance Property**

The token style of the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var tokenStyle: NSTokenField.TokenStyle { get set }
```

## Discussion

The valid values are described in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTokenField/TokenStyle-swift.enum].
